description:
Health care professionals seeking a solid legal advocate have one in the Chapman Law Group of Miami. Its attorneys have decades of experience, primarily in all matters related to health care law. Clients nationwide have benefited from the insight, advice, and guidance of Chapman Law Group, when facing challenges stemming from criminal charges, license defense, and regulatory compliance matters.

Since 1985, Chapman Law Group has followed the philosophy and leadership of founder Ronald W. Chapman Sr. Its team of attorneys knows what is at stake when facing legal challenges. And that is what matters most in your career, including your professional license and reputation.

Whether you are a physician, nurse, or pharmacist, Chapman Law Group will represent you in matters such as professional licensing, regulatory compliance, liability and medical malpractice, health care fraud, criminal defense, health care employment, corporate transactions, and business issues.

Here are some of the benefits you get when working with the knowledgeable and aggressive attorneys of Chapman Law Group:

  • A network of nationwide attorneys in four offices throughout the country. While based in Troy, Michigan, Chapman Law Group has three additional branches in Sarasota and Miami, Florida, as well as a Los Angeles-area location in North Hollywood, California.
  • Approximately one-third of Chapman Law Group's attorneys have earned a Master of Law degree in health law from the Loyola University Chicago School of Law, the nation's top-ranked school in health law studies.
  • Through the years, the firm's attorneys have been recognized by legal peers as among the most respected in the industry. Founder Ronald W. Chapman Sr. made the Super Lawyers list four times in 2016, 2017, 2020, and 2021. Ronald W. Chapman II made the Rising Stars list for six years from 2015 to 2020, and Wedad Suleiman made the 2021 Rising Stars list.

Throughout the country, hundreds of healthcare provider clients - whether they have legal questions or face potential career challenges - have sought the insight and skills of Chapman Law Group. Its attorneys are ready to represent you to the best of their abilities.
